name: GetTimeEntriesInDateRange
description:
Retrieve time entries within a specified date range.

Use this tool to view time entries filtered by start and end dates. By default, it returns entries from the last 30 days for the authenticated user. To access entries for other users, use the 'assignee' parameter. You may apply location filters with 'space_id', 'folder_id', 'list_id', or 'task_id', but only one at a time. Note: Negative duration entries indicate a running timer.

parameters.name: workspace_id
parameters.description: Specify the Workspace ID for filtering time entries when using custom task IDs.

value_schema.description: Workspace ID

parameters.name: content_type
parameters.description: Specifies the format of the response content. Usually set to 'application/json'.

parameters.name: start_date_in_unix_milliseconds
parameters.description: The start date of the time entries in Unix time (milliseconds).

value_schema.description: Unix time in milliseconds

parameters.name: end_date_unix_milliseconds
parameters.description: Specify the end date in Unix time (milliseconds) to filter time entries up to this point.

value_schema.description: Unix time in milliseconds

parameters.name: filter_by_assignee
parameters.description: Filter by user IDs. Use commas to separate multiple IDs (e.g., '1234,9876'). Only accessible to Workspace Owners/Admins.

value_schema.description:
Filter by `user_id`. For multiple assignees, separate `user_id` using commas.\
 \
 **Example:** `assignee=1234,9876`\
 \
***Note:** Only Workspace Owners/Admins have access to do this.*

parameters.name: space_id
parameters.description: Include time entries associated only with tasks in the specified Space using its ID.

value_schema.description: Only include time entries associated with tasks in a specific Space.

parameters.name: folder_id
parameters.description: Include time entries for tasks in a specific folder by providing its ID. Only one location filter (space, folder, list, or task) can be used at a time.

value_schema.description: Only include time entries associated with tasks in a specific Folder.

parameters.name: specific_list_id
parameters.description: Include only time entries associated with tasks in a specified List by providing the List ID.

value_schema.description: Only include time entries associated with tasks in a specific List.

parameters.name: specific_task_id
parameters.description: Include only time entries associated with the specified task.

value_schema.description: Only include time entries associated with a specific task.

parameters.name: workspace_id_for_custom_task_ids
parameters.description: Provide the Workspace ID when referencing a task by its custom task ID, and `custom_task_ids` is set to true.

value_schema.description:
When the `custom_task_ids` parameter is set to `true`, the Workspace ID must be provided using the `team_id` parameter.
 \
For example: `custom_task_ids=true&team_id=123`.

parameters.name: include_task_tags
parameters.description: Set to true to include task tags in the response for associated time entries.

value_schema.description: Include task tags in the response for time entries associated with tasks.

parameters.name: include_location_names
parameters.description: Include the names of the List, Folder, and Space in the response along with their IDs when set to true.

value_schema.description: Include the names of the List, Folder, and Space along with the `list_id`,`folder_id`, and `space_id`.

parameters.name: include_approval_history
parameters.description: Set to true to include the approval history for each time entry, with status changes, notes, and approvers.

value_schema.description: Include the history of the approval for each time entry. Adds status changes, notes, and approvers.

parameters.name: include_approval_details
parameters.description: Include detailed approval information for each time entry, such as Approver ID, Approved Time, List of Approvers, and Approval Status.

value_schema.description: Include the details of the approval for each time entry. Adds Approver ID, Approved Time, List of Approvers, and Approval Status.

parameters.name: use_custom_task_ids
parameters.description: Set to true to reference tasks by their custom task IDs. Requires specifying the team_id.

value_schema.description: If you want to reference a task by it's custom task id, this value must be `true`.

parameters.name: include_only_billable_entries
parameters.description: Set to `true` to include only billable time entries, or `false` for non-billable entries.

value_schema.description:
Include only billable time entries by using a value of `true` or only non-billable time entries by using a value of `false`.\
 \
For example: `?is_billable=true`.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the clickup API.

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Unix time in milliseconds

value_schema.description: Unix time in milliseconds

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: Unix time in milliseconds

value_schema.description: Unix time in milliseconds

parameters.name: assignee
parameters.description:
Filter by `user_id`. For multiple assignees, separate `user_id` using commas.\
 \
 **Example:** `assignee=1234,9876`\
 \
***Note:** Only Workspace Owners/Admins have access to do this.*

value_schema.description:

 \
 **Example:** `assignee=1234,9876`\
 \
***Note:** Only Workspace Owners/Admins have access to do this.*

parameters.description: Include the names of the List, Folder, and Space along with the `list_id`,`folder_id`, and `space_id`.

parameters.description: Include the history of the approval for each time entry. Adds status changes, notes, and approvers.

parameters.description: Include the details of the approval for each time entry. Adds Approver ID, Approved Time, List of Approvers, and Approval Status.

value_schema.description: Include the details of the approval for each time entry. Adds Approver ID, Approved Time, List of Approvers, and Approval Status.

parameters.name: space_id
parameters.description: Only include time entries associated with tasks in a specific Space.

value_schema.description: Only include time entries associated with tasks in a specific Space.

parameters.name: folder_id
parameters.description: Only include time entries associated with tasks in a specific Folder.

value_schema.description: Only include time entries associated with tasks in a specific Folder.

parameters.name: list_id
parameters.description: Only include time entries associated with tasks in a specific List.

value_schema.description: Only include time entries associated with tasks in a specific List.

parameters.description: Only include time entries associated with a specific task.

value_schema.description: Only include time entries associated with a specific task.

parameters.name: custom_task_ids
parameters.description: If you want to reference a task by it's custom task id, this value must be `true`.

value_schema.description: If you want to reference a task by it's custom task id, this value must be `true`.

parameters.name: team_id
parameters.description:
When the `custom_task_ids` parameter is set to `true`, the Workspace ID must be provided using the `team_id` parameter.
 \
For example: `custom_task_ids=true&team_id=123`.

value_schema.description:
When the `custom_task_ids` parameter is set to `true`, the Workspace ID must be provided using the `team_id` parameter.
 \
For example: `custom_task_ids=true&team_id=123`.

parameters.name: is_billable
parameters.description:
Include only billable time entries by using a value of `true` or only non-billable time entries by using a value of `false`.\
 \
For example: `?is_billable=true`.

value_schema.description:
Include only billable time entries by using a value of `true` or only non-billable time entries by using a value of `false`.\
 \
For example: `?is_billable=true`.

parameters.name: team_Id
parameters.description: Workspace ID

value_schema.description: Workspace ID

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
